item.title: Help with random drops
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

okay so I tried to make a vampire that I beefed up drop random phats…yet it’s not working

here is what i put in NPC handler…

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1220) 
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.Vamp(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

And here is what i put in item2.java

public static int Vamp[] = {1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048};

public static int randomVamp()
    {
    	return Vamp[(int)(Math.random()*Vamp.length)];
    }

Anyone know whats wrong… I’m using Allstarscapev2 source

Read full topic
